page.title: 09 THORLEY NEEDS A HALL
page.content: Thorley Manor Residents' Association, Bishop's Stortford,has asked East Herts.District Council to help finance the building of a community centre for the new 284 acre residential development.Two possible sites are near the Sainsbury shopping centre or close to the Harvest Moon public house at the former Piggott's Farm where land is now available. There is,however,no money in the council community services capital spending for the next 5 years.Leaders of St. James the Great church,Thorley, which is outside the new built-up area could provide the necessary cash for a new hall to replace an old one beside the church but residents would prefer a hall where it could be easily reached by many people such as scouts,guides & mother/toddler groups.
